file.content:
--- theme: ../ layout: default --- # The Vision

Encoding Your Knowledge

→
First: Agent does flows you already do efficiently
→
Then: Trust builds → queue as background task → just review
→
Goal: Step farther and farther out of the loop

Reality Check: The "10x" Myth

10x output is NOT instant transformation
Reality: 10% faster here, 5% faster there
These compound over MONTHS
No magic pill - AI does NOT replace knowledge
You're building TOWARDS that future, not there yet
Don't "just let AI handle it" - but build toward it.

--- theme: ../ layout: default --- # Key Takeaways

The Message

Don't let bad examples blind you
This technology is coming - learn to use it well
For skilled engineers, AI is a HUGE force multiplier
The people who know what good looks like win
Skills = compound gains over time
Encoding your knowledge into reusable processes

The Math

Token spend per engineer: ~$1,000/mo
10 engineers token spend: $10,000/mo
Average engineer cost: ~$10,000/mo
40% more effective = $40,000 value
Spend $10K → Get $40K value 4x ROI
The Mentality Shift
"What can we systematize into skills?" → Transfer best practices to the whole team

tool_input.content:
--- theme: ../ layout: default --- # Key Takeaways

The Message

Don't let the bad examples blind you
This technology is coming - learn to use it well
For skilled engineers, AI is a HUGE force multiplier
If you know what you're doing, you'll see exponential gains
Start small - the road to 10x is incremental
10% here, 5% there - these compound over months

The Math

Token spend per engineer: ~$1,000/mo
10 engineers token spend: $10,000/mo
Average engineer cost: ~$10,000/mo
40% more effective = $40,000 value
Spend $10K → Get $40K value 4x ROI
The Mentality Shift
"How can I systematize my knowledge into a skill the AI can be trusted to do?"
Bit by bit, we build AI systems we trust to complete work on our behalf.

My Past 30 Days

Client Projects

$23,480 December Income

Real value is possible if you ENCODE your engineering knowledge

10% here, 5% there - these compound over months
The Math

The Mentality Shift
"How can I systematize my knowledge into a skill the AI can be trusted to do?"
Bit by bit, we build AI systems we trust to complete work on our behalf.

lines: The Math

tool_input.old_string: Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $1,000/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $10K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 40% more effective, that's $40K in value. Spend $10K to get $40K - that's 4x ROI.
tool_input.new_string: Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $400/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $4K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 20% more effective, that's $20K in value - and $20K is conservative. Spend $4K to get $20K - that's 5x ROI.

tool_response.oldString: Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $1,000/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $10K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 40% more effective, that's $40K in value. Spend $10K to get $40K - that's 4x ROI.
tool_response.newString: Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $400/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $4K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 20% more effective, that's $20K in value - and $20K is conservative. Spend $4K to get $20K - that's 5x ROI.
tool_response.originalFile:
--- theme: ../ layout: default --- # Key Takeaways
Don't let the bad examples blind you
This technology is coming - learn to use it well
AI is a HUGE force multiplier
If you know what you're doing, you'll see exponential gains
Start small - the road to 10x is incremental
10% here, 5% there - these compound over months
The Math
Token spend per engineer: ~$400/mo
10 engineers token spend: $4,000/mo
Average engineer cost: ~$10,000/mo
20% more effective = $20,000 value
Spend $4K → Get $20K value 5x ROI
The Mentality Shift
"How can I systematize my knowledge into a skill the AI can be trusted to do?"
Bit by bit, we build AI systems we trust to complete work on our behalf.

lines: But start small. The road to 10x isn't one giant leap - it's won by incremental improvements. 10% faster here, 5% faster there. These compound over months.

-Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $1,000/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $10K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 40% more effective, that's $40K in value. Spend $10K to get $40K - that's 4x ROI.

+Let's look at the math. Each engineer using about $400/month in tokens. 10 engineers = $4K spend. An average engineer costs about $10K/month. If your team is just 20% more effective, that's $20K in value - and $20K is conservative. Spend $4K to get $20K - that's 5x ROI.

The mentality shift is asking: "How can I systematize my knowledge into a skill that I trust the AI to do properly?" Bit by bit, we build AI systems we trust to actually complete work on our behalf. That's the future we're building toward.

The Mentality Shift
"How can I systematize my knowledge into a skill the AI can be trusted to do?"
Bit by bit, we build AI systems we trust to complete work on our behalf.

The Road to 10x is Incremental
10% here, 5% there - these compound over months
